sentences.sContent: In this room you can also find Aleksandr's easel and palettes.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this room you can also find Aleksandr's easel and palettes.
sentences.sCn: 在这个房间你也可以发现亚历山大的画架和调色板。

remMethod.val: ease(轻松) + l → 有了画架， 画起画来轻松多了 → 画架

trans.tranOther: a wooden frame that you put a painting on while you paint it
